analysis.desc: Khel ke itihas mein asaani se navigate karein. Har chaal ka evaluation hota hai taaki aapko uski quality par turant feedback mile.

about.title: Chess Chronicles kyun use karein?
about.p1: Chess Chronicles ek saral avashyakta se paida hua: shatranj vishleshan ko adhik sulabh aur drishya banana. Classic interface ke vipreet, hum spashtata aur upyog mein aasani par dhyan dete hain.
about.p2: Hamara tool Chess.com par khele gaye aapke khelon ko automatically prapt karta hai aur aapko unhe chaal-dar-chaal replay karne ki anumati deta hai. Yeh baar-baar hone wali galtiyon ko pehchanne, apni opening ka adhyayan karne aur yeh samajhne ke liye adarsh tool hai ki aap kyun jeete ya haare.
about.p3: Chahe aap ek shuruati hon jo 1000 Elo tak pahunchna chahta hai ya ek anubhavi khiladi, pragati ki kunji vishleshan mein hai. Chess Chronicles aapko bina kisi vichlan ke adhyayan ka vatavaran pradan karta hai.

video.title: Video Demo
video.subtitle: 2 minute mein sabhi suvidhaon ka upyog karna seekhein

faq.title: Aksar Pooche Jane Wale Sawal
faq.a1: Haan, Chess Chronicles poori tarah se muft aur open-source hai. Hamara lakshya sabhi khiladiyon ke liye, unke star ya budget se nirpeksh, high-quality shatranj vishleshan tools tak pahunch ko democratize karna hai.
faq.q2: Kya mujhe Chess.com Premium account ki zaroorat hai?
faq.a2: Nahi, bilkul nahi. Chess Chronicles ki mukhya taqat yeh hai ki aap apne khelon ka gehrai se vishleshan kar sakte hain bina Chess.com par Diamond ya Platinum subscription ki zaroorat ke. Tool kisi bhi public account ke saath kaam karta hai.
faq.q3: Kya main kisi aur khiladi ke khel ka vishleshan kar sakta hoon?
faq.a3: Haan! Yeh seekhne ka ek badhiya tarika hai. Aap kisi bhi khiladi ka username enter kar sakte hain (jaise 'MagnusCarlsen', 'Hikaru', ya apna local rival) unke khelon, pasandeeda openings aur endgame techniques ka adhyayan karne ke liye.
faq.a4: Haan. Hum Stockfish 16+ ko optimized WebAssembly technology ke madhyam se integrate karte hain. Engine aapki machine par locally chalta hai, jo tez aur private vishleshan ensure karta hai. Aap real-time evaluation (advantage bar) aur sujhaye gaye best lines dekh sakte hain.
faq.q5: Main is tool se apna Elo kaise sudhar sakta hoon?
faq.a5: Sujhaya gaya tarika hai: 1. Chess.com par apne khel khelein. 2. Turant baad mein unhe yahan import karein. 3. Engine ke bina apni galtiyan dhundhne ki koshish karein. 4. Apni hypothesis verify karne ke liye Stockfish activate karein. Is prakriya ko dohrana Elo points jeetneka sabse safe tarika hai.
faq.q6: Kya tool mobile par kaam karta hai?
faq.a6: Bilkul. Interface poori tarah se responsive hai aur smartphones aur tablets par perfectly adapt ho jata hai, jisse aap apne khelon ka vishleshan travel mein ya aaram se apne sofa par kar sakte hain.

footer.text: © 2025 Chess Chronicles - Apne shatranj khel ka vishleshan karein

community.title: Community mein shamil hon
community.desc: Chess Chronicles ek jeevant project hai. GitHub par code mein yogdan dein, suvidhaon ka sujhav dein, ya bas apne doston ke saath apne behtareen vishleshan kiye gaye khel share karein.

seo.introTitle: Shatranj mein sudhar karne ke liye antim tool
seo.introText: Chess Chronicles sirf ek aur PGN viewer nahi hai. Yeh aapke shatranj khel ko sudharne ke liye samarpit ek poora platform hai. Chess.com se apne khelon ko import karke, aap apne khel ke har charan: openings, middlegame aur endgames ka vishleshan karne ke liye design kiye gaye shaktishali tools ke suite tak pahunch prapt karte hain.
seo.whyAnalyzeTitle: Vishleshan pragati ki kunji kyun hai?
seo.whyAnalyzeText: Grandmasters lagatar kehte hain: apne khud ke khelon ka vishleshan karna pragati ka sabse prabhavi tarika hai. Yeh samajhna ki koi chaal galti kyun thi, ek chuuke hue tactical mauke ki pehchan karna, ya yeh mehsoos karna ki endgame jeeta hua tha, khel ki aapki samajh ko mool roop se badal deta hai. Hamara tool is prakriya ko saral, drishya aur sabhi ke liye sulabh banata hai.
seo.stockfishTitle: Aapke browser mein Stockfish ki shakti
seo.stockfishText: Hum WebAssembly ke madhyam se seedhe aapke browser mein duniya ke sabse shaktishali shatranj engine, Stockfish ke navintam version ka upyog karte hain. Iska matlab hai ki aapko jatil software install kiye bina Grandmaster-level ke vishleshan ka labh milta hai. Apne blunders, asuddhiyon (inaccuracies) ka pata lagayein aur un 'behtareen chaalon' ko khojein jo aapko khelni chahiye thi.
seo.beginnersText: Ab apne khelon mein khoye nahi. Un lamhon ko pehchanein jahan aap muft mein material dete hain aur aam opening traps se bachan seekhein. Saaf interface aapko zaroori cheezon par dhyan kendrit karne mein madad karta hai.
seo.advancedText: Apne opening repertoire ko sudharein aur labh (advantage) ko convert karne par kaam karein. Apne sacrifices ki mazbooti aur apne endgames ki sateekta ko satyapit karne ke liye vishleshan ka upyog karein.
seo.privacyText: Chess Chronicles ek junooni open-source project hai. Hum aapka vyaktigat data store nahi karte hain aur tool poori tarah se muft hai. Aapki pragati hamari ekmatra prathmikta hai.
seo.title: Chess Chronicles के बारे में
seo.text: Chess Chronicles शतरंज के प्रति उत्साही लोगों के लिए खेलों का विश्लेषण करने, प्रगति को ट्रैक करने और महान खिलाड़ियों के इतिहास का पता लगाने के लिए अंतिम मंच है। चाहे आप सुधार करने वाले शुरुआती हों या अपनी रणनीति को परिष्कृत करने वाले ग्रैंडमास्टर, हमारे उपकरण हर चाल में गहरी अंतर्दृष्टि प्रदान करते हैं। प्रसिद्ध खेलों को फिर से खेलें, शक्तिशाली इंजनों के साथ अपने स्वयं के मैचों का विश्लेषण करें, और सबसे महान शतरंज दिमागों के पीछे की कहानियों की खोज करें। आज ही हमारे समुदाय में शामिल हों और अपने खेल को ऊपर उठाएं।

fallback.title: Khel nahi mila

about.title: Chess Chronicles के बारे में
about.description: Chess Chronicles के peeche ki kahani jaanein, ek aisa project jo shatranj vishleshan aur AI vikas ko milata hai
about.subtitle: Shatranj ka junoon aur technology ka sangam.
about.mission_text: Chess Chronicles ek saral iccha se utpann hua: kisi bhi khiladi ko, amateur ya anubhavi, muft aur saral roop se apne khelon ka vishleshan karne ki anumati dena. Lakshya aapko apni galtiyan samajhne aur pragati karne ke liye tools pradan karna hai. Bahut jald bhavishya mein, site ek interactive library se bhi samriddh hogi jo shatranj ke itihas ke sabse legendary khelon ko samoohit karegi.
about.story_text: Yeh project ek aadhunik vikas prayog ka phal hai. Developer ke roop mein, maine is site ki architecture ko AI tools ke saath milkar design aur pilot kiya. Is synergy ne vikas ko tez karne mein madad ki taaki mukhya cheezon par dhyan diya ja sake: user experience aur shatranj vishleshan ki quality.
about.translation_text: Main ek French developer hoon. Jabki French version native hai aur English version ko dhyan se review kiya gaya hai, site par uplabdh anya bhashaon ka anuvad AI ki sahayata se kiya gaya hai. Sambhav hai ki kuch nuances ya technical terms apurna hon. Kripya mujhe koi bhi galti report karne mein sankoch na karein!
about.github_text: Yeh project open-source hai ya mere GitHub par dekhne yogya hai.
about.email_text: Ek sawal? Ek sujhav? Mujhe likhein:
